sofas.name: MarleneSofa
sofas.description: A conservative home will love the neutral color palette of this sofa set. The chenille fabric has an earthy texture that adds to the pleasant atmosphere, while the sloped arms and plush cushions are very comfortable and cozy. The accent pillows are the perfect complement, with their intricate scale pattern providing visual contrast to the solid mocha fabric.

sofas.name: ZaffiroSofa
sofas.description: Glamourous, modern elegance with a touch of tradition is what this sofa collection is all about! It's a very trim take on a classic English arm sofa, featuring curved pleated arms and a single row of nailhead trim across the sweetheart style back and front of arms. A comfortable, single cushion bench seat sits gracefully on tall tapered wooden legs.

sofas.name: VincenzoSofa
sofas.description: A retro-inspired modern is in the air with this sofa collection. Ringing in retro, this minimalist collection showcases impeccable tailoring, soft sloped arms, and richly textured upholstery. High-resiliency foam cushions provide superior comfort that lasts.

sofas.name: VivianaSofa
sofas.description: The essence of the classic chesterfield lives on in this beautiful sofa and love seat set. It features the same classic deep tufting, the nailhead trim, and rolled arms. The unique updated silhouette, however, brings it to the modern times. Contrasting, dark pillows pop on top of the gray fabric that's soft to the touch.

sofas.name: SalvatoreSofa
sofas.description: The rigid silhouette of this upholstery set is reminiscent of the classic tuxedo sofa updated for the contemporary home. It features deep acrylic button tufting on both sides of the arms, with nailhead trim on the edges. A simple shape with straight lines coupled with intricate details creates a living room piece that could be as timeless as you want your home to be.

sofas.name: GrandolfMotionSofa
sofas.description: Plush cushions accented with two recliners perfect to cozy up at home. This spacious set features smooth microfiber cushion fine points, and spacious center console storage to easily tuck away controllers or personal favorites.

sofas.name: StallionMotionSofa
sofas.description: Transitional looks and plush comfort make this matching sofa, love seat, and chair set a great addition to any living space. Expertly upholstered in top grain leather match.

sofas.name: WimbledonMotionSofa
sofas.description: A great addition for the family room, this comfortable recliner sofa set has plush cushions covered in a warm brown bonded leather. Invite family and friends over and sit back in relaxation.

sofas.name: RamseySofa
sofas.description: The spacious mod appeal with eye-catching chrome details perfectly complements the radiant chenille upholstery. This piece is designed with down feather blend for total seating comfort.

Nailhead trim on the arms top off this simple, yet sophisticated look.

sofas.name: BranfordSofa
sofas.description: From rich upholstery hues to perfect curves, this collection features a traditional influence that is ready to be dressed up modern. Intricate wood carving outlining the collection arms and base, decorative feet  impeccably comfortable cushioning give each piece a timeless feel.

sofas.name: MarilynSofa
sofas.description: Play mix and match with the versatile color palette of this sofa. It features slightly angled arms and a simple silhouette that harkens back to the mid-century era. On top of that, there's comfort and durability to be had between the removable plush cushions and the tall, tapered legs. Top it all off with your choice of optional matching pillows.

sofas.name: ThelonSofa
sofas.description: From dramatic angled legs to elegantly rolled arms, this textured piece is ready to move, shift and grow with your space. The generously sized design collection is updated  given an edgy complement by the buttery soft leatherette upholstery and traditional silhouettes. Available in this refreshing white and classic black.

sofas.name: HughesMotionSofa
sofas.description: Whether you like to sit back and relax in a recliner or just rest your tired back, this sofa set delivers on all levels. Featuring bonded leather match and padded headrests, this sofa set will make the perfect addition to any living space.

sofas.name: BONAPARTESofa
sofas.description: For a traditional set, this sofa and love seat pair has a few surprises. The seat features a distinct two-tone back with tufted leatherette breaking up the beautifully-patterned fabric. Contrasting welt spices up the otherwise standard, single seat cushion. Elegant rolled arms and intricate wood trims add to the luxury that it brings to any living room.

sofas.name: GAFFEYSofa
sofas.description: This functional living room group features a sofa and love seat with built-in recliners and a stand-alone recliner. The love seat includes a center console with two cup holders and a pair of bluetooth speakers, allowing you to play your music wirelessly. The whole set is upholstered in black bonded leather match.

sofas.name: BONSALLOSofa
sofas.description: Simple, straight lines produce an elegant contemporary living room set. Comfort is the priority in the design of this upholstered sofa, love seat, and chair in black bonded leather match.

sofas.name: DUDHOPESofa
sofas.description: This attractive transitional set includes nailhead trim and over-stuffed back, with end recliners on the sofa and love seat. A matching recliner adds a cozy, relaxing feel to the end of a long day.  Finished in a rustic dark brown bonded leather match.

sofas.name: HAZLETSofa
sofas.description: Tired of the common microfiber or leatherette sofas? Looking for something that feels different? Try this unique seating group, fully upholstered in chenille fabric with a two-tone color palette. The seat is brown with stripes, while the base is dark brown. It has plush cushions and built-in recliners on the sofa and love seats. A stand-alone recliner chair is available to complete this unique set.

sofas.name: PLAYASofa
sofas.description: There are many ways to liven up a space; one way is to splash some colors. This love seat does that, with its modern design and neutral gray fabric combined with bright yellow, orange, and blue pattern on the pillows. A sectional variant is also available.

sofas.name: MAKRISofa
sofas.description: These matching sofa, love seat, and chair are upholstered in durable bonded leather and are featured in red, black and gray. Chrome legs and foldable headrests make this set perfect for any contemporary living room.

sofas.name: LichfieldSofa
sofas.description: A great looking addition to any home, this casual living room group features a sofa with built-in recliners and a love seat with two glider recliners and built-in console. A glider recliner is available, also upholstered in bonded leather match.

sofas.name: LeiaSofa
sofas.description: Ultra stylish featuring a button tufted design with a slightly reclined back support, this sofa set is both contemporary and functional.

sofas.name: NewburgMotionSofa

sofas.name: LAVERNESofa

sofas.name: VOLOSSofa

sofas.description: This versatile living room group has multiple options for comfort! The three pieces may be combined with a corner chair to form a sectional. sofas.name: FRANKLINSofa
sofas.description: With a mix of patterns and textures, this smart seating group has attractive carved trim and extra designer cushions, and is perfect for a traditional home. An optional sleeper sofa is also available.

sofas.name: DINARSofa
sofas.description: This oversized and comfortable seating group has large pillow arm rests and ample seating. The rustic dark brown bonded leather brings out the contrasting top stitching and adds to the elegance of the set.

sofas.name: TekirSofa
sofas.description: This sleek contemporary seating group adds comfort and style to any living room. Contrasting and pronounced stitching adds to the flair of this beautiful sofa group, which comes in either dark chocolate or white bonded leather.

sofas.name: SofiaSofa
sofas.description: This modern sofa features a tried and true design, making it a favorite living room piece. Plush seating and expert upholstery promise long-lasting quality and style. Available in a variety of colors.

sofas.name: MAKRISofa
sofas.description: These matching sofa, love seat, and chair are upholstered in durable bonded leather and are featured in red, black and gray. Chrome legs and foldable headrests make this set perfect for any contemporary living room.

sofas.name: NEW SARUMSofa
sofas.description: Inspired by modern design elements, this plush sofa, love seat, and chair are the epitome of urban chic. Soft flannelette fabric has a pleasant texture, while the matching pillows bring contrast to make this set a beautiful addition to any modern home.

sofas.name: LAVERNESofa
sofas.description: A two-tone style made from a combination of elephant skin microfiber and espresso leatherette gives this set an interesting look. Choose between chocolate or tan.

sofas.name: VOLOSSofa
sofas.description: This set has unique features, such as the seat cushions tucked under the  rolled arms, curved chrome legs, and double-stitching on top. Available in red, white and espresso, this seating group will add modern style to any home.

sofas.name: SofiaSofa
sofas.description: This modern sofa features a tried and true design, making it a favorite living room piece. Plush seating and expert upholstery promise long-lasting quality and style. Available in a variety of colors.

sofas.name: FernaSofa
sofas.description: Plenty of straight lines are featured in this contemporary seating group. Square stitching design is found on the bonded leather match seats and backs, while the headrests are adjustable using a pneumatic gas lift mechanism. Available in red, white, or black.

sofas.name: BERKSHIRESofaw/CenterConsole
sofas.description: This versatile living room group has multiple options for comfort! The three pieces may be combined with a corner chair to form a sectional. Likewise, a love seat upgrade with a center console and a sofa upgrade with a folding console and storage are also available. Upholstered in sturdy brown leather-like vinyl, each piece has a comfy recliner or handy drink tray.

sofas.name: FRANKLINSofa
sofas.description: With a mix of patterns and textures, this smart seating group has attractive carved trim and extra designer cushions, and is perfect for a traditional home. An optional sleeper sofa is also available.

sofas.name: HattonSofa
sofas.description: Casual and comfortable, this three piece contemporary leatherette living group features a full sofa, love seat, and chair. Available in 2 colors

sectionals.name: Rosanna IISectional
sectionals.description: Show your passion for pillows with this loose back pillow sectional. Welt trim lines each cushion for a contoured design and the built-in apron keeps dirt and dust away. Arrange the pillow back cushions to cater to your particular comfort needs and delve into deep comfort with its dense foam fill. Slim track arms add finishing detail, framing the sectional for a well-focused living space.

sectionals.name: NellieSectionalW/PullOutSleeper
sectionals.description:
Enhance your decor with gorgeous contemporary flair by displaying this multifunctional sectional front and
center in your home! Keep linens and other items in the convenient storage compartment inside the ottoman
for when guests come to stay the night, easily pushing the two pieces together to create a comfy bed!
Perfect for your guest room or family room, this piece is easy on the eyes while also helping conserve space.

sectionals.name: Maxine IISectional
sectionals.description: Simple yet chic, this transitional sectional is the perfect fixture to unify your living room together! The linen-like fabric upholstery and decorative skirt add extra refinement that complements the draping skirt and sloped armrests for a chic look everyone will love. Complete with a welt trim, this sectional is the ideal piece to transform your home into a relaxing paradise with a warm and cozy ambiance.

sectionals.name: PattySectional
sectionals.description:
When looking for a functional piece to
upgrade your home, look no further than this
sectional! Designed with unparalleled comfort
in mind, this piece enhances your comfort
with adjustable headrests without taking
away from the contemporary aesthetics. This
multifunctional sectional provides the perfect
place to stretch out and relax while also easily
converting into a bed for guests. Decorated
with contrast stitching for a modern look,
this sectional is the perfect combination of
comfort and style to make your home a chic
gathering place for friends and family!

sectionals.name: Badalona IISectional
sectionals.description: Blending a mix of contemporary fashion with traditional elements, this simple yet sleek sectional is a warm and inviting way to update your living space with transitional style! The spacious design showcases stylish T-cushion seating that is upholstered in linen-like fabric for a comfy yet durable feel. Giving it a touch of character with its rolled arms, this sofa set has cozy comfort written all over it!

sectionals.name: MarianSectional
sectionals.description: Give yourself the gift of comfort with the soft linen-like fabric and comforting foam cushions that cover this spacious sectional. Its modular design gives this piece complete versatility, changing shape to accommodate a wide variety of living spaces. Sloped arms add angular intrigue and frame the sofa for a focused aesthetic. With plenty of accent pillows and sleek block legs to complement, this grey sectional will add a cool touch to keep you comfortably relaxed.

sectionals.name: RhianSectional
sectionals.description: Take home this charming sofa set and create the perfect atmosphere for your beautiful home. A perfect contemporary blend of traditional and modern elements, this transitional design is covered in linen-like fabric and features rolled arms for a classic appearance. The overstuffed cushions provide not only a soft and comfortable feel, but also offer a visually sleek look that complements the minimalistic style of this chic sofa set.

sectionals.name: MoniqueSectionalW/2Recliners3Drop-DownTablesConsole
sectionals.description: Surround yourself in comfort and style with the reclining sectional. Soft nubuck fabric is paired with dense foam cushions to create plush pockets of comfort from every angle. Oversized head and arm rests billow as the latch activated recliners smoothly slide up to create a relaxing pose with supported leg rests. Never leave your seat with a storage compartment for quick stowing. Update your home to expansive living room seating with integrated functionality that keeps your home looking refined.

sectionals.name: MarianSectional
sectionals.description: Give yourself the gift of comfort with the soft linen-like fabric and comforting foam cushions that cover this spacious sectional. Its modular design gives this piece complete versatility, changing shape to accommodate a wide variety of living spaces. Sloped arms add angular intrigue and frame the sofa for a focused aesthetic. With plenty of accent pillows and sleek block legs to complement, this grey sectional will add a cool touch to keep you comfortably relaxed.

sectionals.name: SadieSectionalW/Ottoman
sectionals.description: If you have a taste for the classics, then this contemporary piece is the perfect addition to your home. With a bit of a retro spin, this minimalist sectional is sleek in design with chrome bracket feet and slim track arms. The corner design is covered in soft fabric to enhance our relaxation and help you fall in love with your living room all over again.

sectionals.name: OrnellaSectional
sectionals.description: A neutral design that fits a multitude of living space needs and dcor styles, this classic sectional is the perfect piece to place in an ever-changing household. The linen upholstery showcases the fitted cushions and track arms while masking the high-density foam cushions within. Button tufted inner arms add extra details to the overall appeal while the light gray upholstery can be paired with a variety of dcor pieces.

sectionals.name: NenaSectional
sectionals.description: No need to find a good excuse to enjoy this stylish living room reclinerall of your guests will want to spend as much time as possible relaxing against its top grain leather match surface! The plush foam beneath the upholstery adds plenty of comfort that is enhanced by the thick pillow-top armrests. Make the day even better by flipping up the footstool with the manual recline lever. Featuring prominent stitched details, this recliner brings a visually appealing presence to your living room!

sectionals.name: MarianSectional
sectionals.description: Give yourself the gift of comfort with the soft linen-like fabric and comforting foam cushions that cover this spacious sectional. Its modular design gives this piece complete versatility, changing shape to accommodate a wide variety of living spaces. Sloped arms add angular intrigue and frame the sofa for a focused aesthetic. With plenty of accent pillows and sleek block legs to complement, this grey sectional will add a cool touch to keep you comfortably relaxed.

sectionals.name: CassandraSectional
sectionals.description: Transform your dreams of luxury into reality by starting with this elegant living room collection. The intricate wood trim draws attention to the smooth chenille fabric while enhancing the printed patterns of the accent pillows and fitted cushions. High density foam cushions ensure comfort for all seated guests and the hardwood frame offers structural integrity for years to come.

sectionals.name: JoelleSectional
sectionals.description: Showcasing a singularly simple elegance, this sectional highlights the best of transitional design! With a stylish skirt running around the entire frame and a minimalistic look, this sleek piece will charm everyone with its chic appearance. Charming and quaint, this piece will complete your living space and give your home an inviting sense of coziness.

Sloped bases add curvaceous detail to the sectional and match beautifully with the ottoman. Rest your legs after a long day and kick them up on the ottoman for a relaxing pose. Rediscover what comfort means with this refined sectional and ottoman set.

sectionals.name: ElwickSectional
sectionals.description: Relinquish your old chair and find comfort in the arms of this sylish chair. The soft fabric is backed by dense foam cushion to deliver a distinguished level of luxury. Scrolled arms are elegantly detailed by nailhead trim as it wraps the soft curves and base with metallic accents. Nestle up with a good book on the accent chair or simply lounge out on the comfortable chair. However you define relaxation, this chair will satisfy all your comfort needs.

sectionals.description: Define your home with this fashion forward sectional. Plush cushions and coil springs deliver undeniable comfort and lasting support to keep you comfortably relaxed. Lounge out on the chaise or cozy up on oversize armrests as stresses seem to slip away. sectionals.name: JoyaSectional
sectionals.description: Come home to comfort and style, this sectional sofa features a clean-cut visual, and can be paired with the matching patterned arm chair and ottoman to add personality. Its simple lines are supported on long, tapered legs, giving a chic and modern appearance. Printed pillows make the perfect accent pieces and provide added comfort.

sectionals.name: ClareSofa
sectionals.description: Versatile and multifunctional, this sofa set offers multiple arrangement options to personalize your living space. The handy ottoman can be integrated into a long sofa or doubles as a comfortable chaise while every seat offers plush cushioning for your comfort. Charming button tufts along the backs add unique style as the soft brown linen creates a warm and inviting atmosphere. End table included.

sectionals.name: Glenda IISectional
sectionals.description: Enjoy the cozy and inviting ambiance that this contemporary piece brings into your living room! The L-shaped sectional offers plenty of seats for everyone to stretch out while the button tufted cushions provide relaxing lumbar support. A sophisticated welt trim adds contrast to each of the color options and helps accentuate the sloping track arms for a stunning visual effect that will give your living room a modern vibe.

sectionals.name: Glenda IISectional
sectionals.description: Enjoy the cozy and inviting ambiance that this contemporary piece brings into your living room! The L-shaped sectional offers plenty of seats for everyone to stretch out while the button tufted cushions provide relaxing lumbar support. A sophisticated welt trim adds contrast to each of the color options and helps accentuate the sloping track arms for a stunning visual effect that will give your living room a modern vibe.

sectionals.name: Kate IISectional
sectionals.description: Modern design gets a retro twist with this fun modern sofa set with sleek leatherette upholstery and tapered legs. The U-shaped frame encompasses plush tufted cushions that are as attractive as they are comfortable. This mid-century modern inspired design is sure to be a hit in any contemporary home!

sectionals.name: HardySectionalw/Console
sectionals.description: Bask in the alluring comfort of this corner sectional and feel the days troubles and worries drift away. Flip up the footstools and recline to find the perfect position for relaxation, or stretch out on the leatherette upholstered chaise for a quick catnap. The convenient center console features a dual cup holder and storage compartment to help store everything you need to make your living room your sanctuary.

sectionals.name: HeraSectional
sectionals.description: With soft chenille fabric to pair alongside the chrome supports, this sectional embodies both old-fashioned and contemporary styles in one design. Two ogee-patterned pillows add visual dimension to the simple L-shaped structure. Chrome finished legs and armrest beams add a modern flair that will update any living space.

sectionals.name: KamrynSectionalw/Console
sectionals.description: Bask in the alluring comfort of this corner sectional and feel the days troubles and worries drift away. Flip up the footstools and recline to find the perfect position for relaxation, or stretch out on the leatherette upholstered chaise for a quick catnap. The convenient center console features a dual cup holder and storage compartment to help store everything you need to make your living room your sanctuary.

sectionals.name: Skyler IISectional
sectionals.description: This essential modern living room set features plush seats and cushions and attractive rolled arms.

sectionals.name: GlasgowSectional
sectionals.description: If you and your guests are the type that like to lounge around the living room with your feet up or just like sitting in the company of friends and family, this corner sofa set offers all of that and then some.

sectionals.name: Jolanda IISectional
sectionals.description: A regal design to fit with any upscale living room, this sectional incorporates traditional and modern styles together. Crystal-like acrylic buttons adorn the tufting along the backrest while nailhead trim runs down the armrests as glamorous accents to the structured sectional. Pillows included.

sectionals.name: Karlee IISectional
sectionals.description: Game day just got better! Invite your closest friends over to watch the game while comfortable reclining seats add a touch of relaxation. The sectional and sofa set each features plush cushions and multiple reclining seats that your guests will fall in love with! A console with a storage compartment and built-in duo cup holders make it convenient to keep drinks nearby so you can stay put to watch the game.

sectionals.name: SarinSectional
sectionals.description: Create a luxurious and sophisticated living room with this uniquely shaped sectional . Curved for design and comfort, the sectional features a tufted back paired with sloped armrests, all for a modern appeal. Matching accent pillows, available in two different sizes, add a charming touch.

sectionals.name: JoleneSectional
sectionals.description: Recharge after a long day on this reclining sectional. With plenty of seats and plush cushions, this sectional will provide your family with the best comfort around. A storage console doubles as an armrest, tucking items out of sight, while two cup holders keep drinks near at hand. Upholstered in brown leatherette, this reclining sectional will bring a whole new level of relaxation to your home.

sectionals.name: BetriaSectional
sectionals.description: Make your living room shine and sparkle with this gorgeous contemporary sectional. Upholstered in a glitter-like shined fabric for a sleek modern appeal, the sectional provides a wide seating area for you and your guests. Sloped armrests and angled backrests are unique designs that make this sectional pop with little effort.

sectionals.name: DaynaSectional
sectionals.description: Kick back and relax after a long day on this elegant sectional. Upholstered in gray faux leather and supported on tapered chrome finished legs, this L-shaped sectional will be the focal point of your living room. This versatile seating piece features a pull-out bed that will prove convenient for overnight guests while a storage compartment within the chaise tucks away any spare bed sheets or accessories. Paired with two matching accent pillows and adjustable headrests, this multifunctional sectional will be the perfect addition to your home!

sectionals.name: Glenda IISectional
sectionals.description: Enjoy the cozy and inviting ambiance that this contemporary piece brings into your living room! The L-shaped sectional offers plenty of seats for everyone to stretch out while the button tufted cushions provide relaxing lumbar support. A sophisticated welt trim adds contrast to each of the color options and helps accentuate the sloping track arms for a stunning visual effect that will give your living room a modern vibe.

sectionals.name: EsteeSectional
sectionals.description: With this beautiful tufted sectional, you wont have to compromise style for comfort. The warm gray finish creates a cozy and inviting ambience while maintaining a retro flair. Its tufted backrest and tapered wooden legs are the perfect addition to the minimalistic structure. Taking inspiration from the 70s and incorporating modern influences, this sectional is a trendy design that showcases the best of two different styles together.

sectionals.name: Kallie IISectional
sectionals.description: Flirty red tones with striking chrome legs create a sectional that leaves a vibrant and lively impression in any home. This L-shaped sectional is perfect for a home in need of a makeover. Upholstered in bright red flannelette fabric, this sectional is sure to create a cheerful, lighthearted atmosphere!

sectionals.description: Bask in the alluring comfort of this corner sectional and feel the days troubles and worries drift away. The convenient center console features a dual cup holder and storage compartment to help store everything you need to make your living room your sanctuary.

Charming button tufts along the backs add unique style as the soft brown linen creates a warm and inviting atmosphere. End table included.

sectionals.name: JayleneSectional
sectionals.description: A handsome tuxedo style sectional set that will blend perfectly into any modern home with its modular design. Tightly upholstered in gray linen fabric, this seating set features a low backrest with deep seats. Kick up your feet on its matching ottoman and relax in ease.

sectionals.name: GlasgowSectional
sectionals.description: If you and your guests are the type that like to lounge around the living room with your feet up or just like sitting in the company of friends and family, this corner sofa set offers all of that and then some.

sectionals.description: A regal design to fit with any upscale living room, this sectional incorporates traditional and modern styles together. sectionals.description: With your familys comfort in mind, this sectional offers two reclining seats and a large pushback chaise. An armrest doubles as a storage compartment while two cup holders add convenience. Plush cushioning ensures you get the best comfort, especially when paired with the soft chenille fabric.

sectionals.name: Jolanda IISectional
sectionals.description: A regal design to fit with any upscale living room, this sectional incorporates traditional and modern styles together. Crystal-like acrylic buttons adorn the tufting along the backrest while nailhead trim runs down the armrests as glamorous accents to the structured sectional. Pillows included.

sectionals.name: Gatria IISectional
sectionals.description: Stretch out your legs and lean back into a comfortable position without having to fight over seats! You and your family can all enjoy reclining functions with this comfortable sofa set or sectional. Each seat comes upholstered in black leatherette for a cool and relaxing experience. Plush cushions and baseball stitching accents add shape and dimension to your stylish living room!

sectionals.name: RuthSectional
sectionals.description: You'll absolutely love the versatility of this reclining sectional set. Aside from the superior comfort and relaxation this set provides, its customizable design easily conforms to fit your home decorating needs. Choose to display this set as an L-shaped sectional with the corner seat add-on or as a more traditional sofa and love seat combo. Added functionality comes in the form of the loveseat duo, which comes equipped with a lift-top storage unit and built-in cup holders.

sectionals.name: MaybellSectionalw/2Consoles,Mocha
sectionals.description: Host fun movie nights or crazy game day parties with the ultimate sofa set. With reclining capabilities, cup holders, storage compartments and plush chenille upholstery, you and your guests will not want to get up from your seats! The neutral fabric options are the perfect backdrop that will both blend in and enhance the beauty that fills a living space.

sectionals.name: BlaireSectional
sectionals.description: This sectional guarantees you will always be ready for any situation when you're hosting a get-together. The chaise and loveseat offer plenty of space for guests to sit and relax while the storage space beneath the chaise's cushion provides the perfect place to hide clutter to make room for everyone. Quickly transform this sectional into a guest bed by revealing the extension beneath the loveseat's cushions so you need not worry about unexpected guests staying the night.

sectionals.name: HagenSectional,Navy
sectionals.description: How lovely would it be to come home each day to this inviting sectional? Tightly stitched in soft flannelette upholstery, this sofa is padded to perfection! Whether you choose to kick off your shoes and stretch your tired body across the chaise or snuggle up against the track armrest, grab a pillow and get comfortable because this sectional was made for your enjoyment.

sectionals.name: JensenSectional
sectionals.description: This sofa set showcases everything you look for in a living room collection. Separate the ottoman from the sectional to offer a spacious and comfortable seating arrangement for entertaining guests. Push the ottoman inwards to create a comfortable bed to stretch out on. Supported atop sturdy tapering wood legs, this sofa set will provide plenty of versatile comfort for years to come.

sectionals.name: HardySectionalw/Console
sectionals.description: Bask in the alluring comfort of this corner sectional and feel the day's troubles and worries drift away. Flip up the footstools and recline to find the perfect position for relaxation, or stretch out on the leatherette upholstered chaise for a quick catnap. The convenient center console features a dual cup holder and storage compartment to help store everything you need to make your living room your sanctuary.

sectionals.name: Stanford IISectional
sectionals.description: Kick it up a notch in your living space with this stunning sectional set. Lay upon the plush cushions, rest your feet upon the lovely square ottoman and feel the stress of the day melt away. From the gorgeous nailhead trim to lavish rolled arms, this set will take you into a world of comfort and luxury that is all your own.

sectionals.name: PollockSectional,White
sectionals.description:
Talking about making a statement! This sectional and ottoman combination is daring with its use of color as the focal point of the design. Against the simple ivory backdrop, the stunning array of hues on the matching pillows and ottoman demand attention. If the colors don't take your guests
aback, the plush and comfortable cushions upholstered in stain-resistant
Revolution Fabric will certainly be a pleasant and welcome surprise.

sectionals.name: Hadley IISectionalw/2Consoles
sectionals.description: A spacious design to accommodate you and your friends, this L-shaped sectional is a perfect fi t for the frequent movie night host. Recline in comfort with the double fabrics and enjoy having your drink near at hand with the convenient storage consoles and cup holders.

sectionals.name: ValterSectionalw/Ottoman
sectionals.description: The versatile design of this sectional permits the best of all worlds, whether you need seats to host a get-together in your living room or if an unexpected guest needs to spend the night on the pull-out bed. Choose whether to have the chaise on the left or right by switching where the ottoman is positioned, guaranteeing you'll be able to make this piece work with any dcor situation.

sectionals.name: HagenSectional,Gray
sectionals.description: How lovely would it be to come home each day to this inviting sectional? Tightly stitched in soft flannelette upholstery, this sofa is padded to perfection! Whether you choose to kick off your shoes and stretch your tired body across the chaise or snuggle up against the track armrest, grab a pillow and get comfortable because this sectional was made for your enjoyment.

sectionals.name: Lauren ISectional
sectionals.description: Never compromise your comfort for the sake of style with this sofa set. Supported atop metal bar legs, each piece showcases contemporary style from their slender track arms to their sleek shape. Curl up with a pillow and let the soft chenille fabric whisk your worries away.

sectionals.name: Stanford IISectional
sectionals.description: Kick it up a notch in your living space with this stunning sectional set. Lay upon the plush cushions, rest your feet upon the lovely square ottoman and feel the stress of the day melt away. From the gorgeous nailhead trim to lavish rolled arms, this set will take you into a world of comfort and luxury that is all your own.

sectionals.name: Stanford IISectional
sectionals.description: Kick it up a notch in your living space with this stunning sectional set. Lay upon the plush cushions, rest your feet upon the lovely square ottoman and feel the stress of the day melt away. From the gorgeous nailhead trim to lavish rolled arms, this set will take you into a world of comfort and luxury that is all your own.

sectionals.name: WessingtonSectional
sectionals.description: There's three ways to experience this beautiful living room piece: as a grand corner sofa, a two-piece sectional, or as a sofa/love seat set. Choose the best way to make your living room the warmest place in the home with the flared and fitted back pillows and smooth padded fabric wrapping tightly around every cushion and corner. Snuggle up with the coordinating throw pillows or lean against the soft padded armrests, either way friends and family alike will be instantly smitten with the welcoming and relaxed vibe of this piece.

sectionals.name: DoltonMotionLoveSeat
sectionals.description: Bring a sense of relaxation into your living room decor with this durable leatherette sofa set. Soft lumbar and headrest padding add extra comfort along with the broad armrests. Choose between the regular recliner set or the power-assist set, which comes with an integrated German-engineered motor for easy operation. Either way, you can't go wrong with these spectacular piece for your living room.

sectionals.name: Peever IISectional
sectionals.description: Add some modern charm to your home with this flannelette living room sectional. The tufted cushions provide visual interest while the slightly angled back and armrests offer the best setting for long movies or gatherings. Available in 3 color options.

sectionals.name: DentonSectional
sectionals.description: For smaller spaces, this medium-sized sectional is the perfect option. With a reversible chaise that fits on either left or right side, it effortlessly converts into a bed, making it not only a good looking contemporary piece, but also a smart, versatile choice.

sectionals.name: ForemanSectional
sectionals.description: Sweet relaxation is all yours with this versatile sectional sofa. Enjoy lounging in its cushioned seats, which allow you to fully stretch out and take a breather from the long day. Upholstered in cozy flannelette fabric and filled with foam cushions, this piece adds functionality with its optional pull-out sleeper. Perfect for unexpected guests, this sectional is necessary in every home!

sectionals.name: Sofia IISectional
sectionals.description: This L-shaped sectional makes the most of a space-conscious home with its convenient corner design. The smooth fabric upholstery showcases welted edges, matching accent pillows and button tufted seat backs, making this two-piece sectional a delightful addition to any living room.

sectionals.name: RenataSectional
sectionals.description: When neutral colors leave your home feeling a little bland, choose to add more colorful decorative touches with the fun colors provided by this contemporary sectional. Featuring sleek track arms and entirely upholstered in soft flannelette, this L-shaped sectional offers a stylish update for any setting. The loose back pillows come in nine different colors, creating a rainbow effect to contrast with the warm gray.

sectionals.name: HetlandSectional
sectionals.description: Add a contemporary touch to your home with this sleek L-shaped sectional. The multitude of loose back pillows with alternating colors create a wonderful dimensional appearance and provide cushioned comfort for hours of fun, relaxation and leisure. Chic gray fabric, complemented by angled chrome legs, adds a neutral effect that will fit well with any household.

sectionals.name: PenningtonSectional
sectionals.description: Anticipate coming home to the comfort of this piece. Accompanied with several plush accent pillows, this sectional offers the perfect environment to relax and unwind. The simple and straight forward L-shaped structure fits well into any household and two color options ensure a easy fit with any existing decor.

sectionals.name: WalesSectional
sectionals.description: This transitional, plush seating group features built in recliners and consoles with drink holders. The nailhead trim accents the padded arms. Upholstered in a dark brown breathable leatherette.

sectionals.name: QUAYSectional
sectionals.description: Comfort comes to mind upon seeing this black bonded leatherette piece. Plush cushions, padded arms, T-cushion seating, and a built-in chaise all adds up to a great first impression.

sectionals.name: GARZONSectional
sectionals.description: This large, black sectional has pneumatic gas lifts that allow for adjustable headrests. Fold them all the way for a more sleek and modern look. The matching ottoman shares the same double-stiching and chrome legs as the sectional, serving as a fine centerpiece.

sectionals.name: BOURDET IISectional
sectionals.description: Suitable for any contemporary home, this gray sectional made of bonded leather match will liven up any living room, literally. Blast your favorite tunes from the optional center console speakers, and adjust the pneumatic gas lift headrests to your liking.

sectionals.name: WINCHESTERSectional
sectionals.description: Enjoy the comfort and casual style of this sofa, love seat and chair, all with built-in recliners. Plush seats and arms offer comfort, while an optional corner chair can transform this three piece set into a grand sectional. Made of champion fabric and leatherette.

sectionals.name: PLAYASectional
sectionals.description: There are many ways to liven up a space; one way is to splash some colors. This sectional does that, with its modern design and neutral gray fabric combined with bright yellow, orange, and blue pattern on the pillows. A two piece sofa/love seat variant is also available.

sectionals.name: GARZONOttoman
sectionals.description: The ottoman shares the same double-stiching and chrome leg features as the sectional, serving as a fine centerpiece. Black bonded leather match.

sectionals.name: WINSLOWSectional
sectionals.description: Relax and enjoy the soft comfort of this living room group, which includes built-in recliners in the sofa and love seat with console table included. Create a sectional by adding a corner chair. Upholstered in a rustic brown bonded leather.

sectionals.name: HOLTSectional
sectionals.description: This sectional has folding headrests with pneumatic gas lifts and chrome legs. The single large arm, straight lines, and soft black bella fabricgive this sofa a contemporary look.

sectionals.name: GASPARDSectional
sectionals.description: Enjoy the traditional feel of this lovely sectional. With rolled arms and an attached chaise, this is bound to give your living room an upgrade. Finer details like the contrasting welt and turned legs add to the flair of this welcoming piece.

sectionals.name: ABERDEENSectional
sectionals.description: Great for family rooms, this comfortable sectional has handy built-in cupholders and storage, as well as recliners at both ends. Upholstered in black bonded leather.

sectionals.name: SERRESSectional
sectionals.description: A great addition to a modern home, this elegant sectional has a built-in chaise. Modular in design, this set may be assembled in three different ways to accomodate any living space. Three great colors to choose from: white, gray, and black.

sectionals.name: BellagioFormalDiningTable
sectionals.description: The centerpiece of this set is the beautiful pedestal table, which comes in two styles, adorned with intricate designs on the base and the apron. Two options for the side chairs are offered, as well as a matching mirror and server finished in brown cherry.

sectionals.name: FLORIASectional
sectionals.description: The contemporary shape and style of this sectional will enhance any space with its bonded leather match seating with button tufting and built-in chaise. An optional center console with cupholders and ample storage is offered to boot.

sectionals.name: OliverSectional
sectionals.description: This modern sectional sofa maximizes your corner space while providing ample seating, ideal for any living space. Available in black, brown, and ivory to fit your home dcor.

sectionals.name: KEMINASectional
sectionals.description: Unique with its contemporary shape, this sectional has foldable headrests and armrests and an optional speaker console, which allows for wireless music playing. Available in either white or black bonded leather match.

sectionals.name: KEYSTONESectional
sectionals.description: Upholstered in brown bonded leather match, this comfortable sectional has a center console with cup holders and hidden storage. A stylish top stitching adds style to this set, which also includes three end recliners.

sectionals.description: Super-comfortable and versatile modern sofa collectionnote the super slim arms on these crisp-looking modern pieces, set on sleek wooden legs. Sofa collection features relaxing angle from the tufted back to the extra cushioned seat height that offers plenty of curl-up comfort too!

sectionals.name: KEMIStorageConsole
sectionals.description: This optional center console with cupholders and ample storage is offered in white or black.

sectionals.name: Lodia IDiningTable

sectionals.name: KEMISpeakerConsole
sectionals.description: This optional center console with bluetooth speakers allows you to play all of your favorite music wirelessly in your living room. Available in white or black bonded leather match.

sectionals.name: WOLCOTTSectional
sectionals.description: Great for family rooms, this comfortable sectional has a built-in drink tray and recliners. The seat, back, and arms are finished with brown  elephant skin microfiber, while the base and side panels are covered in espresso leatherette.

sectionals.name: Foster IDiningTable
sectionals.description: Make your dining room unique with this pedestal table decorated with nail head trim. Matching slated chairs accompany this table.
